title: What do I have to do to get an account at the PBE?
body: Hello, I would like to be able to get an account in the PBE, I already have something playing and trying to help the game with the client and I would like to do it in the same way inside the test server.

replies.body:
You can use our PBE Signup Page to apply for the PBE servers. After you apply, you'll need to wait for an acceptance email letting you know we've invited you to join the PBE. We typically choose people based on what we're testing, for instance, when we were testing the Galio rework we may have invited a large number of Galio mains to test his new playstyle. 

You can read up on all the other details about the beta servers in our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).
